EmailTemplate.name: Claremont tour you didn't come
EmailTemplate.subject: Tour for Claremont College families
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
It's unfortunate that you were unable to visit St Andrew’s for our recent school tour for Claremont College families. We run school tours regularly throughout the school term, so if you would like the opportunity to visit again, please feel free to book via our website at http://www.sacs.nsw.edu.au/tourselect/14.
Alternatively, if you would like to book in for a private tour at a time that is more convenient to you, please feel free to contact me directly to arrange.
In the meantime, you and your child are welcome explore the following links to videos and information that provide further insight into our wonderful School community and cohort:
· Senior College
o Experience Senior College via video at http://www.youtube.com/user/StAndrewsOfficial?feature=watch
o Our Interactive Tour on our website provides a unique insight into Senior College life - http://sacs-px.rtrk.com.au/contentpages/Experience-Senior-College;
· Middle School
o Gain an insight into our Middle School from our staff and students in the video “Middle School Matters”at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p525U9I0Htw&list=UUEYV-11iLw9ji0zaxxVMd8A&index=10
o You can see our Head of Middle School, Mr David Smith speak about our Middle School philosophy and supportive learning culture in this video - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsdUEID8y84&feature=youtu.be
Keep up to date with what’s happening at the School via our Facebook page - https://www.facebook.com/StAndrewsCathedralSchool and more videos on our official youtube channel at -http://www.youtube.com/user/StAndrewsOfficial
We look forward to hearing from you and thank you for considering St Andrew’s Cathedral School for your child’s important education and development.
Regards
Robyn Pedley
Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia direct +61 2 9286 9579 email GZietsch@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
